name: Brazen Burglar
description:
You are the Brazen Burglar, robbing from occupied houses in broad daylight!

Steal everything in the house and throw it out the window.
You can only leave when all items are stolen.

Others can only see you if you are in the same room.

The rooms are separated by a stairway which is also one room down the middle.

If you are seen by the owner, the police will be called, if you are seen by the police (when armed) you will get shot and you will die.

Arrow keys to Move
C to Hide under Bed or Couch
Z to Steal Furniture/Appliance
When near a window, Z to Throw Out Furniture/Appliance
When Everything is Stolen, press Z to Escape out the window
R to Restart

(Game seems to run most smoothly in Chrome.)

(Made in one week for Nokia Jam 3.)
